org.eclipse.nebula.paperclips.core.border

Interface Border

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GapBorder, LineBorder

    public interface Border
    Interface for drawing borders, used by BorderPaint and GridPrint for drawing borders a child print and grid cells, respectively.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BorderPainter createPainter(org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Device device, org.eclipse.swt.graphics.GC gc)
      Creates a BorderPainter which uses the given Device and GC.

    • Method Detail

      • createPainter

        BorderPainter createPainter(org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Device device,
                            org.eclipse.swt.graphics.GC gc)
        Creates a BorderPainter which uses the given Device and GC.
        Parameters:
        device - the print device.
        gc - a GC for drawing to the print device.
        Returns:
        a BorderPainter for painting the border on the given Device and GC.
